description.short: Take your writing to the next level with Writing Coach
description.full: Writing Coach is an expert assistant dedicated to providing detailed, constructive feedback and helping you excel in any writing task. Whether you're refining an email, crafting a story, or developing a whitepaper, Writing Coach is here to guide you every step of the way. Writing Coach is designed to work with Microsoft 365 Copilot.

localizationKeys.agentDescription: Writing Coach to help you in your writing.
localizationKeys.agentCSText1: Provide detailed and constructive feedback on a piece of writing.
localizationKeys.agentCSTitle2: Change the tone of an email or message
localizationKeys.agentCSText2: Help change the tone of an email or message from professional language to a more casual tone.
localizationKeys.agentCSText3: Translate a piece of text into another language.
localizationKeys.agentCSTitle4: Teach me how to write instructions
localizationKeys.agentCSText4: Help me write instructions to explain a complex process.
localizationKeys.agentCSText5: Help me write a blog post for my company.
